sentences.en: Few of the men she saw seemed worth a ruinous expenditure.
sentences.cn: 她觉得,她认识的男子中,很少有值得她倾心相爱的.

sentences.en: For newspapers, magazines and television programmes , with their high fixed costs, such fluctuations would be ruinous.
sentences.cn: 这样的起伏波动,对于像报纸, 杂志及电视这样高成本的媒介来说, 是致命的.

sentences.en: He went to the money lenders and borrowed on ruinous terms.
sentences.cn: 他去跟放高利贷的人借钱,订了使他破产的契约.

sentences.en: Herbicide in railway bed often caused the accident pollution in the Itis indirect, sudden and ruinous.
sentences.cn: 铁路路基施除草剂对农田造成的药害污染一般为间接的 、 突发的、毁灭性的.

sentences.en: Many Britons will still fear the potentially ruinous costs of their legal system.
sentences.cn: 很多英国人仍然会对其司法体系可能产生的高昂费用表示担忧。

sentences.en: More often it was impatience that was ruinous.
sentences.cn: 但更多时候误事的原因是他的性子太急.

sentences.en: Part of the ruinous expense comes from the poten - tial for lawsuits.
sentences.cn: 导致破产的部分费用来自可能发生的法律诉讼.
花费之多将是灾难性的.

sentences.en: The house was in a ruinous condition.
The prices in that restaurant are absolutely ruinous.
sentences.cn: 那家饭馆的价钱贵得能把人坑死.

sentences.en: There was no use selling at ruinous figures.
sentences.cn: 以亏本太大的价格出卖是无济于事的.

sentences.en: These are the five Besetting sins of a general , ruinous to the conduct of war.
sentences.cn: 凡此五者,将之过也, 用兵之灾也.

sentences.en: They took a ruinous expenditure on the house.
sentences.cn: 他们为了那所房子倾家荡产.

sentences.en: This was a perfect recipe for a runaway boom - and for a ruinous bust.
sentences.cn: 这不仅是极度繁荣,也是破坏性萧条的最佳途径.
